name: New Year
description:
New Year is a game created for Mini Jam 44. 

The game features a very short story-based game that involves platforming,rhythm and dodging mechanics. Despite it admittedly being extremely short, I hope that my thoughts for the new year is conveyed and whats ahead is positive. 

Regardless of which I wish you all a Merry Christmas and a Happy new year : )

This game is not meant to be taken seriously and meant to be a personal reflection of my current state.
